title: Science-based Simulation Education for Social Innovation Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and awareness of social issues
context.additional_context: VR simulation environments provided for science job seekers to develop social innovation competencies, emphasizing collaborative learning and problem-solving activities using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze community issues and propose solutions by applying scientific knowledge in a VR simulation environment.
Learners enhance critical thinking skills for integrating diverse perspectives through case studies on social innovation.
Learners document personal growth experiences in collaborative problem-solving processes through team-based projects.

resources: VR Content on Socioscientific Issues in Science

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
